name: Garbage Run - A Chute 'Em Up
description:
Garbage Run - A Chute 'em up

This is a very simple game made for the Indie (Mobile) Game Jam, 2023. It was made in about half a day.

Tap/press the screen or use the SPACEBAR to pilot a spaceship that's found its way into a garbage disposal chute.

The ship only has one working thruster, so will flip over each time you thrust, allowing movement in both directions.

Survive as long as you can.
